item.title: Session 2: Homework 1
item.description: Where Do People Drink The Most Beer, Wine And Spirits? # Loading the data library(fivethirtyeight) data(drinks) We’ll check first for any missing variable. Fortunately, our dataset is complete and we have no missing values. # Using glimpse and skim to understand the dataframe glimpse(drinks) ## Rows: 193 ## Columns: 5 ## $ country <chr> "Afghanistan", "Albania", "Algeria", "... ## $ beer_servings <int> 0, 89, 25, 245, 217, 102, 193, 21, 261.

item.title: Project 1
item.description: Watching List Nowadays I don’t really have the time to watch movies. My courses at London Business School are taking most of my time and the rest of my days are dedicated to my applications to Investment Banks for a summer analyst position. So I thought, why not already compile a list of movies to watch once the exams are behind me and my internship found. In order to construct such list, I am going to explore the data movies used during our first assignment in Data Analytics in Finance.
